findings.title: Calculation error (fixed)
findings.description: The function claimRewardExpress increases rewardToBurn variable and subtracting it from claimableReward variable.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function massUpdatePools() uses a loop to update all loops from the poolInfo list and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are too many pool addresses. It is recommended to check that the poolInfo array length is not too big.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to change critical parameters and mint tokens in GoonTreasurer and MasterGoon contracts.
